title: So this is the header of the Hyperionz website, which sells anime related stuff (hyperionz.net). I already searched the site's coding and there's no clue to the typeface, everywhere it shows up is in image format. Any help would be appreciated, thanks!
author: Mister Potato

comments.content: I see [Onyx](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132651/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/onyx) (probably Monotype version) and [Helvetica Neue](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132651/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neue-helvetica) Condensed.
It really does look like Onyx, thanks a lot!
